message: I honestly have no idea what you guys are building...based on the website it looks like some kind of netflow analysis tools.
Or are you guys still in "stealth mode"?
@b How does it compare to something like Librato's offerings?
Our first product is real-time network monitoring based on traffic flows.  That is not the marketing phrase, but you asked in a more technical manner, so I thought I'd respond in kind.

We collect data much lower in the stack, with much more detail, and we retain that level of detail throughout.  This lets users explore and discover the information of interest to them without having to worry that it has been lost through aggregation or other lossy processing.

For example, the first question might be "how much data is this application sending?".  Lots of tools can help you there.  If you want to answer the question "to which other hosts is that application sending data?", you will have some trouble with most tools.
As your needs and understanding change, so will the questions you want to answer.  We built the tool we always wanted to support that evolution.
